per_frame_1=zoom = zoom + 0.01;
per_frame_2=wave_x = wave_x +0.0*sin(8*time);
per_frame_3=wave_mystery = wave_mystery - 2.1*bass;
per_frame_4=rot = rot + 0.025*sin(time);
per_frame_5=cx = cx + if(below(bass,1), +0.25, -0.25);
per_pixel_1=sy = sy + if (above(rad,0.0), + if(below(rad,1), +0.05*sin(bass), 0), 0);
per_pixel_2=warp = warp - pow(bass,treb) - rad*sin(time+bass);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret = ret- (ret*.5);
warp_8=`    ret = ret*(abs(GetBlur2(uv)-.5))*5;
warp_9=`    ret = ret - .01;
warp_10=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2 uvm = uv;
comp_5=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).x,
comp_6=`
comp_7=`ret = lerp (
comp_8=`GetBlur1(uvm).x + GetBlur3(uvm).x,
comp_9=`ret,
comp_10=`pow(ret,.5));
comp_11=`
comp_12=`ret *= 2.7;
comp_13=`
comp_14=`float2 uv3 = (uv-.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).zzz)+.5;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret += saturate(pow(tex2D(sampler_main, uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).x -ret.x)),
comp_17=`ret += saturate(pow(GetBlur1(uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).x -ret.x)),
comp_18=`  
comp_19=`ret = pow(ret,float3(3,.95,.6))*1.25 -.25;
comp_20=`ret -= tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).yyy;
comp_21=`ret *= ret;
comp_22=` 
comp_23=`ret-= .04;
comp_24=`//ret = pow(ret,float3(.5,1,2));
comp_25=`//ret *= ret;
comp_26=`//ret += tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).yyy*2,
comp_27=`
comp_28=`}
